text: The 1942 Washington State Cougars football team was an American football team that represented Washington State College during the 1942 college football season. Head coach Babe Hollingbery led the team to a 5–1–1 mark in the PCC and 6–2–2 overall. The season was Hollingbery's last and marked the longest tenure at the school.
